abstract: A day after stock markets posted their biggest one-day advance in weeks, they made an about-face on Thursday. The major indexes gave back close to half their gains, finishing sharply lower as investors grappled with a blast of disappointing news from Microsoft and the housing market, The New York Times’s Jack Healy reported.
